verbs.description: West Virginia Republicans [V: were] deciding Tuesday between a brash GOP outsider who embraced Donald Trump 's political playbook — but was opposed by the president — and a more traditional party candidate to take on vulnerable Democrat Joe Manchin this fall in an election both parties view as key to Senate control .
